summary: We testified about the federal government’s fiscal condition at the end of FY 2019 and the unsustainable path it is on if policies don’t change. Among our findings: Publicly held debt rose to 79% of GDP. The Congressional Budget Office and our new report both project it will continue to grow Interest on the debt is the fastest growing item in the budget; it is...
title: The Nation's Fiscal Health: Action Is Needed to Address the Federal Government's Fiscal Future
